summary.para: Retrieves the logical path to an .iso image.

param.name: pVal
param.para: Pointer to the logical path to an .iso image. For example, "c:\path\file.iso".

remarks.para: This method is supported in Windows Server 2003 with Service Pack 1 (SP1), Windows XP with Service Pack 2 (SP2), and Windows Vista via the Windows Feature Pack for Storage. All features provided by this update package are supported natively in Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2.

summary.para: Retrieves the IStream object associated with the .iso image.

param.name: data
param.para: The IStream object associated with the .iso image.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

remarks.para: This method is supported in Windows Server 2003 with Service Pack 1 (SP1), Windows XP with Service Pack 2 (SP2), and Windows Vista via the Windows Feature Pack for Storage. All features provided by this update package are supported natively in Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2.

summary.para: Sets the Path property value with a logical path to an .iso image.

param.name: Val
param.para: The logical path to the .iso image. For example, "c:\path\file.iso".

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

description.para: Path '%1!s!' is badly formed or contains invalid characters.

remarks.para: This method is supported in Windows Server 2003 with Service Pack 1 (SP1), Windows XP with Service Pack 2 (SP2), and Windows Vista via the Windows Feature Pack for Storage. All features provided by this update package are supported natively in Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2.

summary.para: Sets the Stream property with the IStream object associated with the .iso image.

param.name: data
param.para: The IStream object associated with the .iso image.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

remarks.para: This method is supported in Windows Server 2003 with Service Pack 1 (SP1), Windows XP with Service Pack 2 (SP2), and Windows Vista via the Windows Feature Pack for Storage. All features provided by this update package are supported natively in Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2.

summary.para: Use this interface to verify if an existing .iso file contains a valid file system for burning.

remarks.para: If a valid path is provided via , an IStream object will be created from the supplied image file and the Stream property will be populated. If a valid IStream is provided via , it will be used directly for image validation and the Path property will not be populated.

This interface is supported in Windows Server 2003 with Service Pack 1 (SP1), Windows XP with Service Pack 2 (SP2), and Windows Vista via the Windows Feature Pack for Storage. All features provided by this update package are supported natively in Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2.
